projectDescription: An intelligent agricultural recommendation platform designed to help small farmers in India make data-driven decisions about crop selection based on their farm conditions, budget, and experience level.
problemStatement: Small farmers in India face significant challenges in crop selection due to lack of access to personalized agricultural advice. They often make suboptimal decisions leading to poor yields, financial losses, and unsustainable farming practices. This system provides data-driven recommendations tailored to individual farm conditions.
solution: A web-based platform that analyzes farm-specific parameters (soil type, water availability, budget, region, experience) and recommends the most suitable crops with detailed guidance on cultivation practices, profitability projections, and farming calendars.
keyFeatures: Personalized crop recommendations based on 8+ major Indian crops
Multi-factor analysis: soil type, water availability, budget, region, season, experience
Risk assessment for pest management and crop complexity
Automated farming calendar with month-by-month activities
Responsive design for mobile and desktop access

recommendationAlgorithm.description: Multi-factor scoring system that evaluates crop suitability based on farm conditions

factors.name: Season Matching
factors.description: Checks if crop season aligns with farmer preference

factors.name: Soil Compatibility
factors.description: Verifies soil type is suitable for the crop

factors.name: Budget Feasibility
factors.description: Ensures cultivation cost fits within farmer's budget

factors.name: Water Availability
factors.description: Matches water requirements with available resources

factors.name: Experience Level
factors.description: Adjusts recommendations based on farming experience

factors.name: Profitability
factors.description: Prioritizes crops with higher profit margins

recommendationAlgorithm.scoringFormula: Suitability = Base(100) - Season_Penalty + Water_Score - Budget_Penalty - Experience_Penalty + Profitability_Bonus

app/.page.tsx: Main landing page with form and results display
app/.layout.tsx: Root layout with metadata and styling

components/.farmer-form.tsx: Input form component for farm data collection
components/.recommendation-card.tsx: Display component for individual crop recommendations

lib/.crop-database.ts: Crop data, soil types, and regional information
lib/.recommendation-engine.ts: Core recommendation algorithm and calendar generation

apiEndpoints.description: Get crop recommendations based on farmer input

userJourney: User lands on homepage and sees form
User fills in farm details (land size, region, soil type, budget, water, season, experience)
System processes input through recommendation engine
Top 3-5 suitable crops are displayed with detailed information
User can view suitability score, profit projections, and farming calendar for each crop
User can make informed decision based on recommendations
futureEnhancements: Integration with government schemes and subsidies

dataSource.cropData: Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR) guidelines
dataSource.costData: Directorate of Economics and Statistics (DES) surveys
dataSource.soilData: National Bureau of Soil Survey and Land Use Planning (NBSS&LUP)

limitations: Current system uses static crop database - real-time market prices not included
Weather predictions are not integrated - uses historical averages
Soil testing must be done manually by farmers
Pest prediction is rule-based, not ML-powered
Regional variations within states not considered
